name: Yerah
description: Yerah is a indie farming game. You can build your farm, collect resources and process them, take care of your animals or send Warriors into adventures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GT 550 TI or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Quad Core Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
